ygData.msgSnippet: oh ok.......then no i almost never make fun of ppl if i dont know them unless they make me really mad  then i do! ne wayz yes i do this for fun but not to make

oh ok.......then no i almost never make fun of ppl if i dont know them unless they make me really mad  then i do! ne wayz yes i do this for fun but not to make fun...2 very different things! well c yall later! bye bye

Su <suceress@...> wrote:
What was your grade in reading comprehension? I was saying that you could
spell correctly but that you were purposely misspelling things for fun.
I had assumed you were doing it to make fun of people who type like that.
:-)
If I were a mean person I'd ask if your whole life was 10 years. ;-D
luv,
-Su
